key.name: master_nodes
key.description: Give the list of the master node like ip:port ip:port...

key.name: name
key.description: Give the name of the cluster

key.name: compress
key.description: If true, enable automatic data compression (compression is only used when compressed size is smaller).

key.name: read-only
key.description: If true, only reads may be executed against the storage. Note that the "pack" operation is not considered a write operation and is still allowed on a read-only neostorage.

key.name: logfile
key.description: Log debugging information to specified SQLite DB.

key.name: dynamic_master_list
key.description: The file designated by this option contains an updated list of master nodes which are known to be part of current cluster, so new nodes can be added/removed without requiring a config change each time.
